page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We did a survey of our area to discover what people did for a living A great number of people are employed at the two M.O.D. bases of Coulport and Faslane.There are policemen fire- men,scientists, general labourers and domestic staff all of whom are needed to run these establishments.This has made a huge impact on employment in this area bringing many people from all over the country to live here. Before the bases came this was a dormitory suburb for Glasgow with people either travelling to work by boat or employed in service industries in the village.There is still one working farm in the district which now concentrates on eggs and sheep and grows no crops.This means that much formely productive ground now lies fallow
